section:
You are taken to see Akradai, prince of the Azure Sky tribe. He is an old friend, and his shamans will cure you of any disease or poison you may be suffering from (but they cannot lift a curse). After a fine dinner at the table of a prince of the steppes, you retire to bed, warm with Kvass, the intoxicating liquor of the nomads. The next day, you continue on your way.
Go north Go east toward Yarimura Go south Head west deeper into the steppes
